title: AlphaTALKS Wall Street Breakfast, June 19: What Moved Markets This Week
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: ﻿It was another quiet start to the week, with markets trading sideways ahead of Thursday's Federal Reserve interest rate decision and accompanying monetary policy statement. The Fed's comments about inflation and interest rates shocked markets, causing a sell-off in commodities, materials, and financials stocks. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
